Hi, Pranay.

This is the project discussion list for the open-source Heritrix 
crawling software; questions about the Internet Archive's crawling 
services should go to IA directly. I'll contact you offlist to get more 
details and make sure you can reach the right people.

- Gordon @ IA

pranay wrote:
> I have two requirements:
>  1) a list of URLs (with scoping specified) needs to be crawled.
>  2) I need the list to be crawled within a reasonable and specific time.
> 
> Based on these two parameters, can I get a rough cost estimate from IA for my crawl? What factors are considered before a cost-estimate is offered to the client or will I be given the estimate only after the crawl is over. Then also I would be interested in knowing the cost and what factors influence it.
> 
> Thanks,
> Pranay
> 
>
